title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to a crazy Divisional Round of the NFL playoffs and the evolution of the QB position we are witnessing with players like Josh Allen and Patrick Mahomes. He praises Rams QB Matthew Stafford for his performance in a win over Tom Brady and the Buccaneers after several teammates almost gave the game away. He tells you why he was wrong about Aaron Rodgers and right about Joe Burrow. Plus, Super Bowl Champion Trent Dilfer joins the show to talk about Aaron Rodgers coming up short in the post season once again. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
